segments.text: It's really late but I'm starving .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey , that coffee shop's lights are still on .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe they have some good pie .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would love a really sticky cinnamon bun .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There was a coffee shop by my house when I was a kid that served cinnamon hot chocolate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mmmm . That sounds like something I had in Mexico once .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good stuff ... Oh , no . The door is locked .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ohhhhh ! And I just got all my juices going !
segments.speaker: S2
